result.reason: Adding a global hotkey (CTRL+ALT+HOME) to activate mRemoteNG is a valid enhancement request for better accessibility.
result.approach: Add RegisterHotKey/UnregisterHotKey to NativeMethods. In FrmMain, register the hotkey on load and handle WM_HOTKEY in WndProc to activate the window.
